verses.kjv: Sing, O barren, thou that didst not bear; break forth into singing, and cry aloud, thou that didst not travail with child: for more are the children of the desolate than the children of the married wife, saith the LORD.
verses.web: “Sing, barren, you who didn’t give birth; break out into singing, and cry aloud, you who didn’t travail with child: for more are the children of the desolate than the children of the married wife,” says LORD.
verses.ct: "Sing for joy, you childless woman who never gave birth! Break into loud, joyful singing, you who never experienced labor pains! Because the abandoned woman will have more children than the married woman," says the LORD.

verses.kjv: Enlarge the place of thy tent, and let them stretch forth the curtains of thine habitations: spare not, lengthen thy cords, and strengthen thy stakes;
verses.web: “Enlarge the place of your tent, and let them stretch out the curtains of your habitations; don’t spare: lengthen your cords, and strengthen your stakes.
verses.ct: "Make your tent bigger — stretch its curtains wide! Don't hold back. Lengthen your ropes and drive your stakes in deep.

verses.kjv: For thou shalt break forth on the right hand and on the left; and thy seed shall inherit the Gentiles, and make the desolate cities to be inhabited.
verses.web: For you will spread out on the right hand and on the left; and your offspring will possess the nations and settle in desolate cities.
verses.ct: You will spread out to the right and to the left. Your descendants will take over nations and fill cities that have been sitting empty.

verses.kjv: Fear not; for thou shalt not be ashamed: neither be thou confounded; for thou shalt not be put to shame: for thou shalt forget the shame of thy youth, and shalt not remember the reproach of thy widowhood any more.
verses.web: “Don’t be afraid, for you will not be ashamed. Don’t be confounded, for you will not be disappointed. For you will forget the shame of your youth. You will remember the reproach of your widowhood no more.
verses.ct: Don't be afraid — you won't be put to shame. Don't be embarrassed — no one will humiliate you. You'll forget the disgrace of your younger days, and the pain of being abandoned like a widow will be a distant memory.

verses.kjv: For thy Maker is thine husband; the LORD of hosts is his name; and thy Redeemer the Holy One of Israel; The God of the whole earth shall he be called.
verses.web: For your Maker is your husband; LORD of Armies is his name. The Holy One of Israel is your Redeemer. He will be called the God of the whole earth.
verses.ct: Your Maker is your husband — the LORD of Armies is his name. The Holy One of Israel is your Redeemer. He is called the God of the whole earth.

verses.kjv: For the LORD hath called thee as a woman forsaken and grieved in spirit, and a wife of youth, when thou wast refused, saith thy God.
verses.web: For LORD has called you as a wife forsaken and grieved in spirit, even a wife of youth, when she is cast off,” says your God.
verses.ct: The LORD has called you back like a wife who was abandoned and heartbroken — like a young bride who was rejected," says your God.

verses.kjv: For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great mercies will I gather thee.
verses.web: “For a small moment I have forsaken you, but I will gather you with great mercies.
verses.ct: "I left you alone for just a brief moment, but I will gather you back with overwhelming mercy.

verses.kjv: In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the LORD thy Redeemer.
verses.web: In overflowing wrath I hid my face from you for a moment, but with everlasting loving kindness I will have mercy on you,” says LORD your Redeemer.
verses.ct: In a surge of anger I turned away from you for an instant, but with everlasting kindness I will show you mercy," says the LORD, your Redeemer.

verses.kjv: For this is as the waters of Noah unto me: for as I have sworn that the waters of Noah should no more go over the earth; so have I sworn that I would not be wroth with thee, nor rebuke thee.
verses.web: “For this is like the waters of Noah to me; for as I have sworn that the waters of Noah will no more go over the earth, so I have sworn that I will not be angry with you, nor rebuke you.
verses.ct: "This is like the days of Noah for me. Just as I swore that floodwaters would never cover the earth again, I now swear that I will never be angry with you or rebuke you again.

verses.kjv: For the mountains shall depart, and the hills be removed; but my kindness shall not depart from thee, neither shall the covenant of my peace be removed, saith the LORD that hath mercy on thee.
verses.web: For the mountains may depart, and the hills be removed; but my loving kindness will not depart from you, and my covenant of peace will not be removed,” says LORD who has mercy on you.
verses.ct: Even if the mountains crumble and the hills disappear, my faithful love for you will never leave, and my covenant of peace with you will never be broken," says the LORD, who has mercy on you.

verses.kjv: O thou afflicted, tossed with tempest, and not comforted, behold, I will lay thy stones with fair colours, and lay thy foundations with sapphires.
verses.web: “You afflicted, tossed with storms, and not comforted, behold, I will set your stones in beautiful colors, and lay your foundations with sapphires.
verses.ct: "You poor, storm-battered city with no one to comfort you — look! I will set your stones in brilliant colors and lay your foundations with sapphires.

verses.kjv: And I will make thy windows of agates, and thy gates of carbuncles, and all thy borders of pleasant stones.
verses.web: I will make your pinnacles of rubies, your gates of sparkling jewels, and all your walls of precious stones.
verses.ct: I will make your towers out of rubies, your gates out of sparkling jewels, and all your walls out of precious stones.

verses.kjv: And all thy children shall be taught of the LORD; and great shall be the peace of thy children.
verses.web: All your children will be taught by LORD; and your children’s peace will be great.
verses.ct: All your children will be taught by the LORD, and they will enjoy deep, lasting peace.

verses.kjv: In righteousness shalt thou be established: thou shalt be far from oppression; for thou shalt not fear: and from terror; for it shall not come near thee.
verses.web: You will be established in righteousness. You will be far from oppression, for you will not be afraid, and far from terror, for it shall not come near you.
verses.ct: You will be built on a foundation of righteousness. Oppression will be far from you — you won't have to fear it. Terror will be far away — it won't come anywhere near you.

verses.kjv: Behold, they shall surely gather together, but not by me: whosoever shall gather together against thee shall fall for thy sake.
verses.web: Behold, they may gather together, but not by me. Whoever gathers together against you will fall because of you.
verses.ct: If anyone attacks you, it won't be my doing. Whoever comes against you will fall before you.

verses.kjv: Behold, I have created the smith that bloweth the coals in the fire, and that bringeth forth an instrument for his work; and I have created the waster to destroy.
verses.web: “Behold, I have created the blacksmith who fans the coals into flame, and forges a weapon for his work; and I have created the destroyer to destroy.
verses.ct: "Look — I'm the one who created the blacksmith who fans the coals into a blaze and hammers out weapons for his craft. And I'm the one who created the destroyer to bring ruin.

verses.kjv: No weapon that is formed against thee shall prosper; and every tongue that shall rise against thee in judgment thou shalt condemn. This is the heritage of the servants of the LORD, and their righteousness is of me, saith the LORD.
verses.web: No weapon that is formed against you will prevail; and you will condemn every tongue that rises against you in judgment. This is the heritage of LORD’s servants, and their righteousness is of me,” says LORD.
verses.ct: No weapon made to be used against you will succeed, and you will prove wrong every accusation brought against you in court. This is the inheritance of the LORD's servants — their righteousness comes from me," declares the LORD.
